Botswana Stock Exchange (BSE) bụ ụlọ ahịa dị na Gaborone, Botswana
E hiwere ahịa ahịa Botswana na 1989 wee bụrụ Botswana Stock Exchange na 1994
Ọ bụ Botswana Stock Exchange Act na-achị ya.

The BSE nwere ndepụta ahịa 36 na ndepụta ngwaahịa atọ: ndenye ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ (BSE DCI); Ndekọ ụlọ ọrụ mba ofesi (BSE FCI), na-ejikọta ụlọ ọrụ ndị nwere ọnụọgụ abụọ edepụtara na BSE na mgbanwe ngwaahịa ọzọ; na Index ụlọ ọrụ niile, nke bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ dị arọ nke DCI na FCI
As well as equities, bonds and Floating Rate Notes are traded
Private investors are estimated to account for under 10% of the total market capitalisation
Foreign-based mining companies make up over 90%.
Oge azụmaahịa nke mgbanwe a na-adị site na 10:00 ruo 14:00 n'ụbọchị niile n'izu ma ewezuga Satọdee, Sọnde na ezumike ndị Exchange kwupụtara tupu oge eruo.
Ikike inye ikike maka ndị na-ere ahịa na Botswana bụ Ministri Ego
Ndị otu nwere ike ịbụ ụlọ ọrụ ma ọ bụ onye ọ bụla.
